Workflow.Name: ReviewHub - Remove user from TempReadWrite team
Workflow.Description:
This flow revokes access from temporary stakeholders that have requested access for a period of 14 days. After the duration elapse the flow revokes access from these users.
Flow failure will result in a breach of access policy and would allow temporary stakeholders to retain access beyond 14 days.

LocalizedName.description: ReviewHub - Remove user from TempReadWrite team

Description.description:
This flow revokes access from temporary stakeholders that have requested access for a period of 14 days. After the duration elapse the flow revokes access from these users.
Flow failure will result in a breach of access policy and would allow temporary stakeholders to retain access beyond 14 days.
